name: MFBOPC v3.2.0.0
body:
## VERSION 3.2.0.0
### BREAKING CHANGES
- All [QuasarApp themes](https://github.com/QuasarApp/QStyleSheet) have been removed, for style compatibility reasons in the incoming Batch Conversion Tool.
- The minimum supported version of [CBBE 3BBB 3BA](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/30174) is now 1.50 (Version 1.40 has been dropped).
- The minimum supported version of [BHUNP](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/31126) is now 2.20 (Versions 2.13 and 2.15 have been dropped).
### BUGS FIXED
- The Assisted Conversion Tool does not have the expected bound values, and can put values where they are not supposed to go.
- A few bugs were corrected but I do not have the exact detail here.
### NEW FEATURES
- Added support for [Mimir Ebonic Body (Custom CBBE sliders and CBBE preset) V.2](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/51173).
- Added (almost full) support of the Traditional Chinese (Taiwan) language, thanks to [Sephirothryan](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/84981953).
- A new GUI theme called "Mitsuriou's Black Theme" is now available to more or less replace the removed themes. This theme is inspired by Samsung's ONE UI design, with a full black/dark background with blue accents. Sources are available [here](https://developer.samsung.com/one-ui/color/system.html) and [here](https://design.samsung.com/global/contents/one-ui/download/oneui_design_guide_eng.pdf).
- There is now a submenu called "Report a bug" under the "Help" menu.
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Some messages have been added for some precise contexts (for example, when saving a project file).
- There is now an option to save the current project before closing the application, if it was not saved.
- The user will now be warned that there are some unsaved modifications when loading a PCP file.
- The main window has been reworked to have some fields placed in a better way.
- The Settings window has been redone with a tab container system.
- The "Last used paths" fields are now more visible and are selectable, in the Settings window
- Some icons have been updated.
- Some texts have been updated/modified (for example, "CBBE 3BBB 3BA" is now "CBBE 3BBB 3BA - by Acro").
- A few more improvements were made but I do not have the exact detail here.
### DEVELOPER NOTE
- Every single preset file has been re-updated and rewritten. The presets generation is now considered as stable, way more than the latest releases. I'm quite happy with the stability of this version, despite the fact that it took me an eternity to rewrite and check all the presets files.
- The "Batch Conversion Tool" is almost ready and will be released in the next minor version, mostly like v.3.3.0.0.
## PREVIOUS VERSIONS NOTES
#### [Patch note for versions 3.1.1.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/3.1.1.0).
#### [Patch note for versions 3.0.x.x and 3.1.x.x is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/3.1.0.0).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.10.x is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.10.2.0).

name: MFBOPC v3.1.1.0
body:
## VERSION 3.1.1.0
### NEW FEATURES
- Added support for the latest BHUNP v.2.35.
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Some windows can now be expanded directly from the windows title bar.
- Progress dialog were added to every single window with disk scanning features. Moreover, it is now possible to cancel these scans while they are running.
### DEVELOPER NOTE
- BHUNP presets generation system has almost been totally rewritten. This version 3.1.1.0 can contain a few bugs on BHUNP presets. If you find any bug, report anything to me, so I can make a correction as soon as possible.
- I am having trouble finishing the "Batch Conversion Tool" as it is a very complex system, but this tool is still expected to come out in a very near release. I want the tool to be able to fit any kind of modding installation so it can be considered as a very useful tool for players. Even if a BETA version comes out soon, I want it to be in a nearly finished state.
## PREVIOUS VERSIONS NOTES
#### [Patch note for versions 3.0.x.x and 3.1.x.x is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/3.1.0.0).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.10.x is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.10.2.0).

name: MFBOPC v3.1.0.0
body:
## VERSION 3.1.0.0 (STABLE)
### BUGS FIXED
- Output path and Output file for "BHUNP 3BBB Advanced Ver 2" v.2.31 are not generated correctly (reported by [Sephirothryan](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/84981953)).
- BodySlide Retargeting tool: the window does not have MSF feet's filter preview.
- BodySlide Retargeting tool: no data is generated at all.
- BodySlide Retargeting tool: a useless and empty filter group is generated for the default feet.
- BodySlide Retargeting tool: while the progress dialog is displayed, it is still possible to click on the windows in the background.
### DEVELOPER NOTE
The features and corrections below should come in the next release:
- Correct a font scaling issue with collapsible menus.
- Finish the "Batch Conversion" tool.
- Add small support for Traditional Chinese language ([Sephirothryan](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/84981953) is working on it).
## VERSION 3.0.2.0 (BETA)
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- The auto-updater at application start can now detect if the user uses a BETA or a stable version.
- The Update window has been updated to have BETA informations and updates if the user is currently using a BETA version.
- A filter is now added by default, when selecting one of the two MSF Feet choice for the Feet part (requested by [Sephirothryan](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/84981953)).
### BUGS FIXED
- BHUNP (and all its variants) version 2.31 is not recognized correctly and leads to generate BHUNP Nevernude presets (reported by [Sephirothryan](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/84981953)).
- The Settings window glitches when the boxes are collapsed and expanded.
## VERSION 3.0.1.0 (BETA)
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- The BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool now reads XML and OSP files in a smarter way, to avoid mismatching values.
- The BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool is now capable to generate XML and OSP files containing only the needed parts (only a Body and Hands blocks for example).
### BUGS FIXED
- BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool: if a folder contains the word "fomod" in it, the folder is skipped by the tool.
- BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool: The backup path is not checked correctly and is almost always green when it should be red.
- (linked to the previous bug) BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool: It is possible to validate a backup creation in a folder that is contained in the directory that is going to be updated.
- BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool: there is small translation error in the backup message, for the French language.
## VERSION 3.0.0.0 (BETA)
### NEW FEATURES
- Added support for the [More Sliders for Feet](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/30072) mod (requested by [Sephirothryan](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/84981953)).
- Added support for the latest BHUNP v.2.30 and BHUNP v.2.31.
- Added support for BHUNP Nevernude (v.2.25 and v.2.30).
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- The way of generating files on the disk has been improved and does not require any file permission change anymore from MFBOPC. It should improve the compatibility of the software with accounts that have limited access to the computer.
- Tooltips have been added to every single button.
- A button has been added to the Settings window to clear every "last used path" value.
- Modal windows are now smaller (better support of low resolution screens).
- It is now possible to scroll in the Settings window (better support of low resolution screens).
- Updated the About window.
### BUGS FIXED
- If there is not any filters set, the buttons are still clickable when opening a "BodySlide Filters Editor" window.
- It is possible to validate an empty BodySlide filters set's name (although it is not creating the set).
- Some very minor fixes have been made too.
### DEVELOPER NOTE
- Huge parts of code have been modified. This version 3.0.0.0 can be a lot less stable than the v.2.x.
## PREVIOUS VERSIONS NOTES
#### [Patch note for the version 2.10.x is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.10.2.0).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.9.x is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.9.5.0).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.8.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.8.0).

name: MFBOPC v3.0.2.0 (BETA)
body:
## ⚠️Quick note:
This version is being released for tests purposes. If you have any free time and you want to test my software and report any bug you find, it will help me to actually release the stable version faster. 😃  
It is highly recommended to uninstall MFBOPC completely (the folder located in AppData too) before installing this release, and before going from this release to an older and more stable one, to avoid any settings file corruption.  
## VERSION 3.0.2.0 (BETA)
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- The auto-updater at application start can now detect if the user uses a BETA or a stable version.
- The Update window has been updated to have BETA informations and updates if the user is currently using a BETA version.
- A filter is now added by default, when selecting one of the two MSF Feet choice for the Feet part (requested by [Sephirothryan](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/84981953)).
### BUGS FIXED
- BHUNP (and all its variants) version 2.31 is not recognized correctly and leads to generate BHUNP Nevernude presets (reported by [Sephirothryan](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/84981953)).
- The Settings window glitches when the boxes are collapsed and expanded.
## VERSION 3.0.1.0 (BETA)
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- The BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool now reads XML and OSP files in a smarter way, to avoid mismatching values.
- The BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool is now capable to generate XML and OSP files containing only the needed parts (only a Body and Hands blocks for example).
### BUGS FIXED
- BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool: if a folder contains the word "fomod" in it, the folder is skipped by the tool.
- BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool: The backup path is not checked correctly and is almost always green when it should be red.
- (linked to the previous bug) BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool: It is possible to validate a backup creation in a folder that is contained in the directory that is going to be updated.
- BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool: there is small translation error in the backup message, for the French language.
## VERSION 3.0.0.0 (BETA)
### NEW FEATURES
- Added support for the [More Sliders for Feet](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/30072) mod (requested by [Sephirothryan](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/84981953)).
- Added support for the latest BHUNP v.2.30 and BHUNP v.2.31.
- Added support for BHUNP Nevernude (v.2.25 and v.2.30).
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- The way of generating files on the disk has been improved and does not require any file permission change anymore from MFBOPC. It should improve the compatibility of the software with accounts that have limited access to the computer.
- Tooltips have been added to every single button.
- A button has been added to the Settings window to clear every "last used path" value.
- Modal windows are now smaller (better support of low resolution screens).
- It is now possible to scroll in the Settings window (better support of low resolution screens).
- Updated the About window.
### BUGS FIXED
- If there is not any filters set, the buttons are still clickable when opening a "BodySlide Filters Editor" window.
- It is possible to validate an empty BodySlide filters set's name (although it is not creating the set).
- Some very minor fixes have been made too.
### DEVELOPER NOTE
- Huge parts of code have been modified. This version 3.0.0.0 can be a lot less stable than the v.2.x.
### STILL TO BE DONE
- Correct a font scaling issue with collapsible menus.
- Finish the "Batch Conversion" tool.
## PREVIOUS VERSIONS NOTES
#### [Patch note for the version 2.10.x is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.10.2.0).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.9.x is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.9.5.0).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.8.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.8.0).

name: MFBOPC v3.0.1.0 (BETA)
body:
## ⚠️Quick note:
This version is being released for tests purposes. If you have any free time and you want to test my software and report any bug you find, it will help me to actually release the stable version faster. 😃  
It is highly recommanded to uninstall MFBOPC completely (the folder located in AppData too) before installing this release, and before going from this release to an older and more stable one, to avoid any settings file corruption.  
Since it is a BETA, you will see a message when starting MFBOPC telling you "The v.2.x is available. Do you want to download and [...]". This is totally normal since v.2.x is the latest stable available on GitHub. To disable this message, go to "File">"Settings" and uncheck "Check for updates at startup".
## VERSION 3.0.1.0 (BETA)
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- The BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool now reads XML and OSP files in a smarter way, to avoid mismatching values.
- The BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool is now capable to generate XML and OSP files containing only the needed parts (only a Body and Hands blocks for example).
### BUGS FIXED
- BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool: if a folder contains the word "fomod" in it, the folder is skipped by the tool.
- BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool: The backup path is not checked correctly and is almost always green when it should be red.
- (linked to the previous bug) BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool: It is possible to validate a backup creation in a folder that is contained in the directory that is going to be updated.
- BodySlide Presets' Retargeting tool: there is small translation error in the backup message, for the French language.
## VERSION 3.0.0.0 (BETA)
### NEW FEATURES
- Added support for the [More Sliders for Feet](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/30072) mod (requested by [Sephirothryan](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/84981953)).
- Added support for the latest BHUNP v.2.30 and BHUNP v.2.31.
- Added support for BHUNP Nevernude (v.2.25 and v.2.30).
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- The way of generating files on the disk has been improved and does not require any file permission change anymore from MFBOPC. It should improve the compatibility of the software with accounts that have limited access to the computer.
- Tooltips have been added to every single button.
- A button has been added to the Settings window to clear every "last used path" value.
- Modal windows are now smaller (better support of low resolution screens).
- It is now possible to scroll in the Settings window (better support of low resolution screens).
- Updated the About window.
### BUGS FIXED
- If there is not any filters set, the buttons are still clickable when opening a "BodySlide Filters Editor" window.
- It is possible to validate an empty BodySlide filters set's name (although it is not creating the set).
- Some very minor fixes have been made too.
### DEVELOPER NOTE
- Huge parts of code have been modified. This version 3.0.0.0 can be a lot less stable than the v.2.x.
### STILL TO BE DONE
- Correct a font scaling issue with collapsible menus.
- Finish the "Batch Conversion" tool.
## PREVIOUS VERSIONS NOTES
#### [Patch note for the version 2.10.x is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.10.2.0).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.9.x is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.9.5.0).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.8.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.8.0).

#### [Patch note for the version 2.8.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.8.0).

name: MFBOPC v2.10.2.0
body:
## VERSION 2.10.2.0 (MINOR UPDATE)
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Assisted Conversion: added a message to avoid data loss when clicking "launch the scan" while some entries already had values affected.
## VERSION 2.10.1.0 (MINOR UPDATE)
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- It is now possible to entirely clean MFBOPC when uninstalling it. Before, some files would be left untouched.
### BUGS FIXED
- Opening the Settings window after updating from an older version of MFBOPC makes the software crash.
## VERSION 2.10.0.0
### NEW FEATURES
- It is now possible to save the values to a ".pcp" (Preset Creator Project) file.
- Is is now possible to load values from ".pcp" (Preset Creator Project) file, from the "File" menu of by drag&dropping the pcp file in the main window directly.
- Settings: added a way of visualizing and clearing the last used paths when selecting them from a directory-chooser or a file-chooser button.
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Assisted Conversion: added bold on certain rows based on detected keywords.
- Assisted Conversion: modified cleaning behavior when some meshes entries are not selected.
- Every "GroupBox" element can now be collapsed to gain a little bit of space on low resolution screens.
- A message has been added to avoid any data loss when using the "Quick relaunch" action.
- If the conversion fails for any reason, the incompletely generated folder will be removed.
- Added a message if the update process could not be started because of an antivirus or a firewall blocking the installer wizard file.
- Improved a few English and French translations.
- Minor tweaks on the GUI.
### BUGS FIXED
- The CTRL+Y bind conflicts with the CTRL+Y bind in input fields.
- The main window does not have its custom BodySlide filters' list refreshed, after the filters were modified from the "Presets' Retargeting" window.
- Settings: clicking on "Cancel" when selecting a color will force the color to black.
### DEVELOPER NOTE
- Some shortcut binds were modified due to conflicts with default Windows' shortcuts.
## PREVIOUS VERSIONS NOTES
#### [Patch note for the version 2.9.x is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.9.5.0).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.8.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.8.0).

name: MFBOPC v2.10.1.0

name: MFBOPC v2.9.5.0
body:
## VERSION 2.9.5.0 (MINOR UPDATE)
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Updated texts for [CBBE 3BBB 3BA v.2.06](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/30174?tab=files).
## VERSION 2.9.4.0 (MINOR UPDATE)
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Added support for [CBBE 3BBB 3BA v.2.05](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/30174?tab=files).
### DEVELOPER NOTE
- Modified the version number to comply with the industry standards (2.9.4 -> 2.9.4.0).
## VERSION 2.9.3 (MINOR UPDATE)
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Updated texts for [CBBE 3BBB 3BA v.2.04](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/30174?tab=files).
## VERSION 2.9.2 (MINOR UPDATE)
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Updated texts for [CBBE 3BBB 3BA v.2.03](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/30174?tab=files).
## VERSION 2.9.1 (MINOR UPDATE)
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Added support for [CBBE 3BBB 3BA v.2.02](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/30174?tab=files).
- Improved the update message at application launch.
- Made the Check for update window smarter by automatically checking for new updates when appearing.
- Minor GUI tweaks.
### BUGS FIXED
- [Appeared in 2.9.0] It is not possible to select anything other than CBBE 3BBB body, some combo boxes are empty otherwise.
- [Appeared in 2.8.0] Selecting the v.2.25 of any BHUNP variant from any of the Settings window's combo boxes is restored v.2.20 instead of 2.25.
## VERSION 2.9.0
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Added support for [CBBE 3BBB 3BA v.2.00](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/30174?tab=files).
- Updated Settings window to have two separate combo boxes for each Body/Version selector.
## PREVIOUS VERSIONS NOTES
#### [Patch note for the version 2.8.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.8.0).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.7.3 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.7.3).

name: MFBOPC v2.9.4.0
body:
## VERSION 2.9.4.0 (MINOR UPDATE)
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Added support for [CBBE 3BBB 3BA v.2.05](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/30174?tab=files).
### DEVELOPER NOTE
- Modified the version number to comply with the industry standards (2.9.4 -> 2.9.4.0).
## VERSION 2.9.3 (MINOR UPDATE)

- Improved the update message at application launch.
- Made the Check for update window smarter by automatically checking for new updates when appearing.

### BUGS FIXED

name: MFBOPC v2.7.3
body:
## VERSION 2.7.3 (HOTFIX UPDATE)
- Added missing OpenSSL's DLL files.

## VERSION 2.7.2 (HOTFIX UPDATE)
- Fixed some issues with network requests.
- Added a potentially missing DLL dependencies.
- Added one missing french translation.

## VERSION 2.7.1 (HOTFIX UPDATE)
- Added forgotten Qt5Network.dll.

## VERSION 2.7.0
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- The Update window now displays a progress bar when downloading the update.
- The Update window now displays the update file size when downloading it.
- The Update window now has a button to cancel the file download.

### BUGS FIXED
- About window: the application icon and the title are stuck together.

## PREVIOUS VERSIONS NOTES
#### [Patch note for the version 2.6.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.6.0).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.5.1 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.5.1).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.5.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.5.0).

name: MFBOPC v2.6.0
body:
## VERSION 2.6.0
### NEW FEATURES
- A brand new "Textures Assistant" tool has been added to the "Tools" menu.

### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- MFBOPC now closes without confirmation if the user did not make any interaction with it.
- A message will now appear to warn the user that the Assisted Conversion tool did not find any ".NIF" file in the scanned directory.
- Every "Groupbox" component now has an icon in addition to the text that was already existing in the previous versions.

### BUGS FIXED
- The scrollbars in the Assisted Conversion window did not have any hand cursor set in their default state.

## PREVIOUS VERSIONS NOTES
#### [Patch note for the version 2.5.1 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.5.1).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.5.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.5.0).

name: MFBOPC v2.5.1
body:
## VERSION 2.5.1
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Updated CBBE 3BBB 3BA version numbers' texts.

### BUGS FIXED
- MFBOPC crashes when clicking on "Remove set" while no set is available, from the BodySlide Filters Editor window.
- MFBOPC crashes when clicking on "New filter" while no set is active, from the BodySlide Filters Editor window.
- MFBOPC crashes when clicking on "Remove all" while no set is active, from the BodySlide Filters Editor window.
- When renaming a filters set with the same name as another already existing set, one of them is randomly erased.

## PREVIOUS VERSIONS NOTES
#### [Patch note for the version 2.5.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.5.0).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.4.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.4.0).

name: MFBOPC v2.5.0
body:
## VERSION 2.5.0
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Remade the "Update" window from scratch.
- Added a release notes visualizer in the "Update" window.
- Added an in-app updater in the "Update" window.

## PREVIOUS VERSIONS NOTES
#### [Patch note for the version 2.4.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.4.0).
#### [Patch note for the version 2.3.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.3.0).

name: MFBOPC v2.4.0
body:
## VERSION 2.4.0
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- Added a checkbox to use only the subdirectory field as the export path.
- Added color choosers in the Settings window. It allows the user to modify the success, warning and danger colors.
- Moved the JSON configurations files to AppData/Local/MFBOPresetCreator/*.
- Added loading messages to the start splash screen.

### BUGS FIXED
- Quick restarting the application makes the user lose all its last opened paths.
- The user cannot save their settings, filters list nor last opened path when using the Installer version.
- The user loses their custom filters list if reinstalling the app through the Installer version.

## PREVIOUS VERSIONS NOTES
#### [Patch note for the version 2.3.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.3.0).

name: MFBOPC v2.3.0
body:
## VERSION 2.3.0
### GENERAL IMPROVEMENTS
- The file choosers buttons will remember the last opened path(s), based on the chosen option from the "Settings" window.
- The Retargeting Tool window will now close instantly if no interaction has been done, instead of displaying a confirmation dialog.
- Added a brand new "Useful links" submenus under the "Help" menu.
- Corrected a little typo on "Bodyslide" instead of "BodySlide", in the main window's English translation.

### BUG FIXED
- In the Retargeting Tool windows, the preview's text color is sometimes wrong for the given context.

## PREVIOUS VERSIONS NOTES
#### [Patch note for the version 2.2.0 is available here](https://github.com/Mitsuriou/MFBO-Preset-Creator/releases/tag/2.2.0).

name: MFBOPC v2.2.0
body:
